name: Large Gothic Industrial Iron Wheel
description:
Extra-dynamic turn-of-the-century wheel with curved claws of thick iron. Very rare! Crusty, rusty patina to ensure you know it means business!

13.25" diameter, 5" long hub.

name: Antique Industrial Cast Iron Gear Decor
description:
Tabletop sculptural presentation of a very rare, turn-of-the-century cast iron gear with raised text. Reclaimed lumber display stand.

6" diameter.

$7 domestic shipping.

name: Custom Swinging Saloon Doors
description:
Convo me and let's make your killer dream doors happen!

For your reference, here's a set of custom handcrafted doors of knotty pine with a greatly distressed patina. Hand wrought iron hardware accents. Custom designed and hand painted for a Buffalo Gap, South Dakota client's ranch home kitchen which included matching massive dining table legs and apron.

Client writes: "Beyond amazing!! You took my idea and ran with it and brought the project home in a way I could have never imagined. Your workmanship is beyond excellent. I am seriously speechless!! I will never be able to thank you enough!!"

name: Large Antique Industrial Gear Sculpture
description:
Stunning authentic antique gear of thick cast iron in a hardcore industrial design! Wonderful, century-old aged patina. Elevated on a reclaimed steel pedestal.

21" tall.

Custom order; please contact me for availability and timing.

name: Vintage Industrial Wheel Sculpture
description:
Extra-amazing old metal wheel with zig-zag claws of 1/4” thick steel. Worn, aged patina with remnants of red paint! Handcrafted custom stand of reclaimed steel elements. Custom order; please contact me for availability and timing.

17” diameter. Stands 21" tall overall.

Available with a wall bracket.

name: Industrial Accent Table
description:
One of a kind, handcrafted artisan table in a hardcore industrial style- a large antique saw mill blade with a luscious aged patina sits on an elegant, turn-of-the-century iron pedestal with casters. Very sculptural! Easily breaks down and legs fold in for compact shipping/storage.

20” diameter blade top; 27” tall.

For your reference, photo 4 shows the table with a 23” diameter glass top; cited price and shipping DOES NOT include the glass. It can be included for an additional $40 and its shipping cost, but it may be more economical for you to locally purchase a glass top to your specs.

name: HLJ 86- Antique Industrial Iron Gear Sculpture
description:
Ornate 1800's cast iron wheel mounted on an antique buggy jack pedestal. Wheel spins. One-of-a-kind. Part of the HLJ Sculpture Series; see other listings for other pieces in this series.

Jacks up from 25"-35" tall. 

STATUS: Sculpture is being welded together now. Please contact me to reserve.

name: Large Industrial Gear Wall Art
description:
Stunning old wheel with curved spikes and luscious remnants of original green paint!

Heavy duty bracket projects the wheel 3" from the wall, allowing it to spin and create a dazzling effect with light and shadow! See video at http://youtu.be/Dh9pZ_UHLRg

19” diameter.

Custom order; please contact me for availability and timing.

name: Antique Industrial Double Wheel Swivel Caster Set
description:
Antique set of 4 KILLER heavy duty cast iron industrial casters. Double-wheel and swiveling! Each wheel is covered with embossed text stating: Run Rite, The Hamilton Caster & Mfg Co. Two have a 1906 patent date, while the other two state 1921. One (left caster in 2nd photo) still has its grunge-scraper bar on the front to keep your factory's grunge from soiling these luscious wheels!

3" overall height. 2 1/4” diameter wheels; 3.5” x 2.25” mounting plates. In strong and sturdy condition with oxidation; no chips, cracks, welds.

From a mold of my own creation, each casting is individually handcrafted. Due to the nature of the process, your sculpture will be unique and one-of-a-kind. Please allow 3 weeks for crafting, curing and delivery.

name: Large Antique Industrial Cast Iron Wheel
description:
Late 1800s cast iron wheel. Oxidized patina.

24" diameter. Two available.

Last photo is for your reference, as to how this heavy wheel made a trough in the soil into which the corn seed in the bin dropped and was planted. Gearing on the wheel determined distance between kernels. Extremely rare wheel due to the invention failing to perform well, so few were produced. A great piece of American history!

Please see my listings of a similar Campbell Corn Drill wheels.

name: Large 1800s Industrial Iron Gear
description: Massive gear with curved spokes. 21" diameter.

name: Large Industrial Wheel Wall Art
description:
Stunning, late 1800s industrial wheel in a dynamic spiked design. Pressed steel in a convex form with an amazing aged patina with remnants of original red paint! Custom metal bracket suspends the wheel away from the wall to create interesting play of light and shadow.

21” diameter.

Please note that this is an authentic American antique. Your handpicked piece will reveal its personal story through its own unique patina with variations in color, wear, age and weathering. Please contact me if your cosmetic needs are specific.

Last photo is for your reference, as to how this heavy wheel made a trough in the soil into which the corn seed in the bin dropped and was planted. Gearing on the wheel determined distance between kernels. Extremely rare wheel due to the invention failing to perform well, so few were produced. A great piece of American history!

Please see my listings of 2 other similar Campbell Corn Drill wheels.

name: Aged Victorian Saloon Doors
description:
One-of-a-kind set of elegant swinging doors. Handcrafted in my studio, they feature a large upper portion of antique-style diffusion art glass- clear glass with lots of air bubbles and a rippled texture. The lower panels have recycled antique banisters and French style wooden ornaments on the back. Decorative molding accent. Warm gray hand painted finish with a worn effect and numerous pigmented glazes to create a very aged and rich patina.

For a 36” opening- each door measuring 17.5” wide, 41” tall. Complete with new brass hanging hardware for immediate installation.

Or convo me with your specifications and let's discuss the perfect doors for you!

name: Antique Industrial Gear Decor, 1800s
description:
Very rare mid-1800s gear of cast iron with curved spokes and an engraved numeral indicating the number of teeth along its wide rim. Sits in a rustic reclaimed lumber display stand.

8” diameter; 1” wide. One chipped cog.

From the Montgomery Worsted Mills, an old textile mill on the U.S. National Register of Historic Places along the Wallkill River at the end of Factory Street in the village of Montgomery, New York. It was one of the earliest efforts to harness the river for industrial purposes. Please see my listings of other gears from the mill.

16" diameter.

name: Farmhouse Industrial Saloon Doors
description:
Let's create a set of custom swinging doors unlike any you’ve ever seen! Reclaimed antique turned spindles? Vintage baking pans? Victorian ceiling tin? Old iron gears? Distressed painted finish? Here's a gallery to give you ideas of what I can create.

Convo me with your budget, dimensions, and thoughts, and I'll put together some options for you to consider. Cited pricing is merely for discussion purposes; actual estimate will vary depending on level of intricacy, size and materials.

name: Large 19” Antique Industrial Gear
description: Massive gear of thick steel with a worn and very grungy gray painted finish. Wicked gear teeth lining the edge. Measures 19” in diameter; .25" thick.  1.25" axle hole.

name: Large 24" Decorative Antique Industrial Iron Gear
description:
Huge old cast iron gear with a rich patina! Perfect for making that tabletop!

24” diameter, 1” thick.
